headline: Truist Maintains Buy Rating on American Express (AXP) Citing Rising Growth Costs Following Q4 Results
summary: American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) is one of the stocks that should double by 2030. On February 2, Truist lowered the price target on American Express to $400 from $420 and maintained a Buy rating. The firm is updating its model following the company’s Q4 2025 results. Furthermore, JPMorgan reduced the firm’s price target for American […]

headline: Intapp price target lowered to $35 from $68 at Truist
summary: Truist analyst Terry Tillman lowered the firm’s price target on Intapp (INTA) to $35 from $68 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares after its Q2 earnings beat and below-consensus outlook. The company showed durable fundamentals in Q2 despite an “overdone selloff”, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The guide appears modestly light vs. Street expectations, but the 30% drawdown was a “significant overreaction”, the firm added.Valentine's Day Sale - 70% OffUnlock hedge fund-level data a
